# Dragonhide Plate
## Overview
**Aura** no aura (nonmagical); **CL** —

**Slot** armor

**Price** 3,300 gp

**Weight** 50 lbs.

**Description**

This suit of full plate is made of [[Dragonhide|dragonhide]], rather than metal, so druids can wear it. It is otherwise identical to masterwork full plate.

**Construction**

**Requirements** —

**Cost** 1,650 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 466
